title: PSA: Do not focus Alistar when he is ulting
body:
I realize that it's the teamfight meta.

I realize you shouldn't charge past the tank to focus somebody else isn't suggested.

But you're doing 70% reduced damage to somebody building straight tank.  Could you fucking not blow half your ults on him while solely trying to kill him during a fight while the Riven murders the backline?

replies.body: Imo, if Alistar tries diving the backline it should be the support's duty to cc him (it's their role to protect the backline, and you want your mage/tank to save their rotations for priority targets. It's not just ults, it's cc wasted in teamfights that leads to Katarina pentakills). If he doesn't attempt to go for the backline, he's not going to do much other than reposition your frontline (which can be lethal in a teamfight, so be careful). His ult isn't useful if you don't focus him, so don't be in a position he can benefit from that.
Thank you. For reiterating my entire point.

*facedesks*

I'm up way too late.

Should have just said "agreed" and let it be at that.

_In a heavy teamfight, an {{champion:12}} with no cooldown builds uses WQ on a tanky Braum **only**, and starts his ult. A retarded {{champion:67}} still focuses him & gets killed by the enemy carry_
{{champion:59}} : Dude, why the fuck did you still focused Alistar?
{{champion:67}} : Because he was in the way!
{{champion:59}} : ...how? His only 2 CC abilities were off cooldown, I just can't... https://36.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m7bjr0xDHj1rbsctpo1_500.jpg
It's like the people who blow all of their spells onto Braum's shield, or the people who don't know what Thresh's lantern does,

>  the people who don't know what Thresh's lantern does,

I was playing ARAM yesterday and got this guy......so many deaths that could have been avoided. All they had to do was click.

It sucks man. Sometimes we click it and we end up missing. 

Yes something that stupid happens. It's not as crazy as you think.

Truly the tanks weakness is lack of attention. 

Then they have all that CC
You still shouldn't dump all of your abilities on the tank.  That's just being stupid.
But if we don't focus him 5v1... how are we gonna kill him? I mean he reduces damage by 70%

Well, legends say that after 7 seconds, he stops reducing damage.

But those are just legends, right? Who's ever actually lived to see such a thing happen?

PSA: Do not focus Poppy when she is ulting someone else!
Wait... What is a Poppy?
what are you talking about?, Yasuo/vayne and alike melt full Tank Alister Ultimate mode on, in seconds..
And you can melt him even faster after it. Oh the magic of logic.
{{champion:114}} I will ult him if I please.
This is true, on the other hand, if there's not a Riven murdering me, I'm certainly not walking past Ali to try and hit other people (as a squishy carry anyway).
I've killed many Alistars while ulted, Darius main
